posts.post_content:
I have a 1884 Lawson's Catcher card that is graded SGC 92 NM/MT. I would like to trade my 92 for an SGC 84 NM, and $25.00, or an agreed upon card. According to the SGC population report there were four cards graded 84. If you have one and would like to upgrade or know who has an 84, please let me know.

[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v140/jennepenn/1884Catcher.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v140/jennepenn/1884Catcher1.jpg[/IMG]
